ReportText: Exam: XR CHEST AP OR PA ONLY INDICATION: Respiratory distress or failure requiring intubation with or without ventilator support. COMPARISON: 06/04/00. TECHNIQUE: AP semi-supine view of the chest is obtained. FINDINGS: Stable support devices. Stable cardiomegaly. Slightly improved lung volumes with decreased atelectasis in the left base. No pneumothorax or other acute complication. Remaining visible anatomy stable. IMPRESSION: Slightly improved lung volumes. Chest otherwise stable.
